com.solace.aaron.geo.api

Class RadixRangeSearch1d

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solace.aaron.geo.api.RadixRangeSearch1d

  • public class RadixRangeSearch1d
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a generalization of the original decimal-only (base 10) ranged filtering algorithm.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RadixRangeSearch1d.RadixSegmentRatioComparator
      This internal helper class is used to sort the various segments to determine which should be split next.
